archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0598
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As an existing customer, I want to be able to purchase international calling minutes, so that I can make international calls to a country of my choice when I need it.

properties.value: OOTB. Assumption: this is a simple pre-paid bucket of minutes; not the micropayments Confirmed. Dayly or monthly. (for business there will be a need of a common bucket for mobile and fixed)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
